com.soa.soap.message
Class SOAPVersionRegistry

java.lang.Object
  com.soa.soap.message.SOAPVersionRegistry

public class SOAPVersionRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

Provides retrieval of SOAPVersion implementations based on namespaces. Only SOAPVersions that have been registered will be returned.

Method Summary
static SOAPVersionRegistry getInstance()
          Returns the singleton instance of the SOAPVersionRegistry.
 SOAPVersion getVersion(java.lang.String namespace)
          Returns a SOAPVersion implementation based on namespace.
 void registerVersion(java.lang.String namespace, SOAPVersion version)
          Registers a SOAPVersion implementation for a given namespace.
 SOAPVersion unregisterVersion(java.lang.String namespace)
          Unregisters a SOAPVersion implementation for a given namespace.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getVersion

public SOAPVersion getVersion(java.lang.String namespace)
Returns a SOAPVersion implementation based on namespace.

Parameters:
namespace - Namespace of the SOAPVersion to retrieve.
Returns:
SOAPVersion matching the given namespace.

registerVersion

public void registerVersion(java.lang.String namespace,
                            SOAPVersion version)
Registers a SOAPVersion implementation for a given namespace. Any SOAPVersion previously registered for the namespace will be replaced.

Parameters:
namespace - Namespace of the SOAPVersion.
version - SOAPVersion implementation to register.

unregisterVersion

public SOAPVersion unregisterVersion(java.lang.String namespace)
Unregisters a SOAPVersion implementation for a given namespace.

Parameters:
namespace - Namespace of the SOAPVersion to un-register.
Returns:
SOAPVersion matching the given namespace, null if none found.

getInstance

public static SOAPVersionRegistry getInstance()
Returns the singleton instance of the SOAPVersionRegistry.

Returns:
SOAPVersionRegistry singleton instance.
